info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 9:47AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BELMONT... SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...WEST CENTRAL GREENE AND MARSHALL COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 AM EDT... At 947 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moundsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Moundsville, Shadyside, Powhatan Point, Glen Dale, Cameron, West Finley, Aleppo, Grove Oak, Glendale, Rocklick, Lone Oak, and Glen Easton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
